headline: Erie Indemnity (ERIE) Valuation Check After Mixed 1 Year Return And Premium P/E Multiple
summary: Why Erie Indemnity (ERIE) is Back on Investors’ Radar Erie Indemnity (ERIE) has drawn fresh attention after a mixed performance picture, with a month gain of about 2% but a 1 year total return decline of roughly 29%. With shares recently closing near $287.71 and longer term total returns over 3 and 5 years still positive, many investors are reassessing how the company’s fee based insurance services model fits into their portfolios.
